ECoGEmotion¶

ecog_processing.ecog_emotion.find_filename_data(au_emote_dict_loc, classifier_loc, real_time_file_loc, out_loc, out_q, filename, return_plot_data=False, event_delta_seconds=1)¶

Find PSD data for given file and dump it

Parameters:
  • au_emote_dict_loc – location of au_emote_dict, in json format
  • loc (classifier) – location of pickled classifier
  • real_time_file_loc – location of real times
  • out_loc – Where to dump PSD data
  • out_q – Output queue for multiprocessing
  • filename – File to find data of
  • return_plot_data – Whether this is used for plotting
  • event_delta_seconds – Seconds around an event to do PSD of
ecog_processing.ecog_emotion.get_window_data(raw: mne.io.fiff.raw.Raw, times, corr, picks, eventTimes, tqdm_num, filename, return_plot_data=False, event_delta_seconds=1) → tuple¶

Get PSD data from ECoG around event times of choice

Parameters:
  • raw – Raw ECoG file
  • times – ECoG times
  • picks (MNE picks format) – Channel picks
  • eventTimes – Event times
  • tqdm_num – used in multiprocessing
  • filename – Name of video file for progress bar description
  • return_plot_data – Whether or not this is being used for a plot
  • event_delta_seconds – Seconds around an event to do PSD of
ecog_processing.ecog_emotion.listener(fn, q)¶

listens for messages on the q, writes to file.
